Html:
Hi,

Is there any easy way to put the y-axis on the right instead of the left?

Thanks,
Kamel

Hi Kamel,

Yes, there is an easy way:
1) you should slightly modify interface IAxis in D3\Charts\Axes\IAxis.cs: add setter to Placement property (it should look like this:Â AxisPlacement Placement { get; set; })
2) and now you can get plotter's vertical axis from ChartPlotter.VerticalAxis property and set it's Placement property to Placement.Right.

That's all!

Mikhail.
